content: originally published in magknits 1 this pattern can now be found in english on the strickanleitungen website to find the pattern go to archive org and in the search box type magknits com then go to year 2007 and double click any dates in october then click patterns on the upper left of the page and the pattern is at the bottom click on it and it s there archived magknits version 2 in english this pattern in german called regenbogensocken is also available in german only on the designer s website 3 *update* the pattern has now been translated to english 4 on the designer s website 1 http //web archive org/web/20071012213512/http //www magknits com/oct07/patterns/rainbow htm 2 http //web archive org/web/20071012213512/http //www magknits com/oct07/patterns/rainbow htm 3 http //anleitungen bestrickendes de/index php page=shop product_details&category_id=14&flypage=shop flypage&product_id=267&option=com_virtuemart&itemid=1 4 http //anleitungen bestrickendes de/index php page=shop product_details&flypage=shop flypage&product_id=300&category_id=40&manufacturer_id=0&option=com_virtuemart&itemid=152
